name: TTSDonationMessages
0:
”Alexa open TTS donation messages”
”Alexa ask TTS donation messages for a new message”
”Alexa ask TTS donation messages for more”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. t. s. donation messages
des:
Entertain yourself with popular text to speech audio clips. Hear a new donation message that you can send to your favorite streamer.

You can get the text sent to you by email by saying "Save" after hearing a message. Just make sure you have granted email address permission in the skill settings.
